snippet: The Syrian National Council resisted an initiative on Saturday that would place all opponents of the government under one umbrella — a streamlining sought by foreign backers.
abstract: Syrian National Council, largest anti-government coalition, resists initiative that would place all opponents of government under one umbrella; such streamlining is sought by foreign backers who fear that bickering exile movements are being eclipsed by events on nation's battlegrounds.

byline.contributor: Hala Droubi contributed reporting from Doha, and Hania Mourtada from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: The Syrian National Council resisted an initiative on Saturday that would place all opponents of the government under one umbrella — a streamlining sought by foreign backers.

headline.seo: Syrian National Council Resists Unification With Other Groups
headline.main: Syrian Group Fights Effort to Unify Foes of Government

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
